name: Exemptions of voters on election day
text: §11-94  Exemptions of voters on election day.  Every voter shall be privileged from arrest on election day while at the voter's polling place and in going to and returning therefrom, except in case of breach of the peace then committed, or in case of treason or felony. [L 1970, c 26, pt of §2; gen ch 1985]
